description: choosing at random without careful selection
example: Modern warfare often results in the indiscriminate killing of combatants amd innocent civilians alike.
He's a voracious reader of historical novels (= he reads a lot of them eagerly and quickly)
You chose exactly the same wallpaper as us — what a coincidence!
Are you anticipating a lot of people at the party tonight?

description: to ask for something in a sincere and emotional way
example: She implored her parents not to send her away to school

description: to predict or foretell a future event
example: He is in a good position to prognosticate on the future of commerce.
